hero.title: About CreativeFlow
hero.subtitle: We're a team of passionate creatives, strategists, and innovators dedicated to transforming brands through powerful storytelling and data-driven marketing.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2018, CreativeFlow emerged from a simple belief: that every brand has a unique story worth telling. What started as a small creative studio has grown into a full-service marketing agency, but our core mission remains the same – to create meaningful connections between brands and their audiences.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services and process.
faq.question1: How long does a typical project take?
faq.answer1: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. A simple branding project might take 2-4 weeks, while a complete marketing campaign could take 2-3 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.
faq.question2: What's included in your marketing packages?
faq.answer2: Our packages are customized based on your needs but typically include strategy development, creative execution, campaign management, and detailed reporting. We'll create a tailored proposal after understanding your specific requirements.
faq.question3: Do you work with small businesses?
faq.answer3: Absolutely! We work with businesses of all sizes, from startups to enterprise companies. We believe every brand deserves exceptional marketing, and we tailor our services to fit different budgets and needs.
faq.question4: Can you help with both digital and traditional marketing?
faq.answer4: Yes, we offer comprehensive marketing services including both digital (social media, paid ads, SEO, web design) and traditional marketing strategies. We create integrated campaigns that work across all channels.
faq.answer5: Our unique combination of creative expertise and data-driven strategy sets us apart. We don't just create beautiful campaigns – we ensure they deliver measurable results. Plus, our collaborative approach means you're involved every step of the way.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: Don't wait – let's discuss your goals and create a strategy that drives real results.
